author: andschwa
body: Needs ulimit bumped and some Pester tests modified. Resolves #629. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/848)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
`ulimit` bump was due to long-standing bug dotnet/cli#809, and could not be done in the module due to #847.

I need to update documentation still.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Got a confetti ball from @daviwil in Slack, taking that as a sign-off :wink:

title: Enable OS X tests on Travis
